updates.contents: We've confirmed that the platform is healthy and all platform operations have been restored.
updates.title: Heroku API Offline

updates.contents: API operations have been restored. We are continuing to monitor the platform for any other issues.

updates.contents: The Heroku API is currently unavailable. Running apps are not affected. We are continuing to investigate.
